item.title: Any1 Have a Tut for Fixing Barrage
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

[code]ok ill give it a shot.

first look in your client.java for this:

if(magicID == 12891)

then replace yours with mine:

if(magicID == 12891) //ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(6529, getItemSlot(6529), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }]

ok ill exsplain what some of this code means before you add it first if you look at this part of the code:

if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) thats of cores the runes you need to cast the spell if you dont what it so you need runes delete that along with this:

else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { and this:

deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(6529, getItemSlot(6529), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); if you want it so you need runes dont delete anything. and also if you do you might want to change what runes you need becouse i use tokkul as bloods on my server to reduce lagg couse bloods lagg way to much so if you want to change that just change the 6529 to what ever you use as bloods and the outher numbser are the water runes and death runes. ok and after you add that and edit it find this again:

[if(spellID == 12891) then again change yours to mine

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(6529, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(6529, getItemSlot(6529), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } } and after you added that and made it look like the first one you added save and compile and there ya go i hope it works.[/code]

Read full topic
